biotools.summary: SAPP is a Semantic Annotation Platform with Provenance and is designed on the basis of Semantic Web and is FAIR by design. The platform and corresponding modules allows you to annotate genomes of various qualities with the full chain of provenance. Resulting is a RDF genome data model which you can query and analyse using SPARQL. Various modules are available which allows you to annotate, visualise and export to various formats.
